title: Team Standup Meeting
description: Daily standup meeting with the development team. Discuss progress, blockers, and plan for the day.

title: Project Presentation
description: Present the Smart Office Planner project to stakeholders. Prepare slides and demo.

title: Client Requirements Review
description: Review client requirements for the new features. Prepare questions and documentation.

title: Seminar Paper Submission
description: Submit the Smart Offices seminar paper. Final review and formatting needed.

title: Coffee Break with Colleagues
description: Informal coffee break to discuss new ideas and team building.
